summary: The implementation covers the payment gateway integration for backend (REQ-1, REQ-2) and partially implements frontend requirements (REQ-3, REQ-4, REQ-5, REQ-7). However, REQ-6 (admin dashboard payment configuration) is partially implemented with limited scope, and REQ-3 (checkout page integration) appears incomplete or missing from the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the checkout page (CheckoutPage.tsx) to integrate with the new gateway, displaying payment options and handling the payment flow initiation
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence of CheckoutPage.tsx modifications in the diff. The requirement specifies updating CheckoutPage.tsx to display payment methods, initiate payments, show loading states, and display errors, but this file is not present in the modified files list.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update admin dashboard payment configuration section to include gateway-specific settings (API credentials, webhook URL, enabled status)
missing_requirements.reason: AdminDashboardPage.tsx only implements enabling/disabling the gateway provider. Missing: API credentials form, webhook URL configuration, secure credential input fields, and validation for incomplete credentials.

hallucinated_features.description: Extensive collective report functionality including submission, retrieval, filtering, and visualization components (CollectiveFilters, CollectiveSharePrompt, PlatformDistribution, ReasonDistribution, TrendChart)
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest specifies a payment gateway integration project with no mention of collective reporting features. These components appear to be unrelated to payment processing.

hallucinated_features.description: Evidence management system including timeline, upload, filters, selection toolbar, and real-time capture with camera/audio/video support
hallucinated_features.reason: No evidence-related requirements in the BuildRequest. The project focuses on payment gateway integration, not evidence management.

hallucinated_features.description: Appeal system components and evidence picker functionality
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest contains no requirements for appeal generation or evidence picking features. These are unrelated to payment gateway integration.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin testimonial moderation panel referenced in AdminDashboardPage
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement for testimonial management in the payment gateway integration BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Support summary generation and case email utilities
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not include requirements for support case management or email generation features.

hallucinated_features.description: Neighborhood and region selection utilities for collective reporting
hallucinated_features.reason: Not related to payment gateway integration requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: ZIP export functionality for evidence files
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement for file export features in payment gateway integration.
